title: The Lord Is Our Shepherd
verses: The Lord is our Shep-herd, our guardian and guide; What-ev-er we want, he will
kind-ly pro-vide. To th'sheep of his pas-ture his mer-cies a-bound, His
care and pro-tec-tion his flock will sur-round.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Based on Psalm 23, emphasizing God's care and protection for His people
